tool_description: Obtain all data from any Trustpilot website. Useful for creating carousels with reviews. This is a non-official API that retrieves information directly from their website.

api_list.name: GetFeedbacksbyDomain
api_list.description: Obtain feedbacks by specifying a 'domain' and 'page'. This API also provides information about the business associated with the domain.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain of the business for which feedback is requested.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: The page number of the feedback results to retrieve.
